item.title: I'm going to announce my next game, and you can help!
item.description: I'm going to announce my next game, and you can help! Hey guys, quick little post to tell you I sent the Lexispell steam page for review, so it should be up soon! I'm going to be live on Twitch on Wednesd...…]>

item.title: Lexispell (word game) private playtest #2
item.description: Lexispell (word game) private playtest #2 Since the last playtest, I made a lot of visual and gameplay changes. I'd love to get some feedback on this new version with new controls scheme, lots...…]>

item.title: Cool things I've seen on the internet - September 2025
item.description: Every month I share with you the cool things I see on the internet: Godot news, tools, gamedev tips and tricks, cool projects and the game I've played!
